title: Replay: Ep 18 with Jia Tolentino
itunes:title: Replay: Ep 18 with Jia Tolentino
itunes:subtitle: Hi Geezers! Caroline is off this week, but please enjoy a replay of her chat with the amazing Jia Tolentino from March, 2020.Jia Tolentino of The New Yorker is here today to talk about her favorite bra, even though no one is wearing bras anymore bec...
description:
Hi Geezers! Caroline is off this week, but please enjoy a replay of her chat with the amazing Jia Tolentino from March, 2020.


Jia Tolentino of The New Yorker is here today to talk about her favorite bra, even though no one is wearing bras anymore because we have nowhere to wear them. She and Caroline also discuss the plight of boob measurements and also how we’re handling quarantining. Life is very normal, of course! Why do you ask?



Very important for when we get back to the world, Jia’s favorite bra is currently on sale and the Natori website is offering 25% off your order this week: https://fave.co/2vQgBAf I recommend getting it in lots of colors because you’re gonna wanna be known as “fun bra gal” when we can go outside again. ALSO, when we can go outside again, New Yorkers MUST run, NOT WALK, to Nordstrom on 57th and go see Bo in the bra department.


In a more serious tone, I hope you are all hanging in there and giving yourself some space to be a little “off.” If you aren’t listening to Doree and Kate’s new podcast, HERE FOR YOU, it’s a great way to both acknowledge the state of the world while also not overwhelming yourself (as I tend to do). Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/here-for-you/id1503438711


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Natori Feathers Bra: https://fave.co/2vQgBAf
  • Chantelle Bra (There are lots of bra sales right now, can’t imagine why): https://fave.co/33Uxzdp
  • Animal Crossing and the Nintendo Switch: https://amzn.to/2QM35os
  • Revlon (on sale again but please consider waiting to order): https://amzn.to/2vVSKzk


Buy Trick Mirror (or any book!) from Jia’s favorite indie bookstore in Ann Arbor, MI (they are doing $1 shipping!): https://www.literatibookstore.com/books 


Top 8 Best Selling Products in the Gee Thanks! Community in 2020!


8. The Hot Tub ($529): https://amzn.to/3aYP1TO

7. Digit for saving: https://digit.co/r/GeeThanks?ab

6. Rakuten for cash back while you shop: https://www.rakuten.com/r/CAROLI33174?eeid=28187

5. Universal Standard: https://fave.co/3l5KtN7

4. LED Lights: https://amzn.to/2WZO9WG

3. Home Comforts: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780743272865

2. The Revlon One Step: https://amzn.to/3o96cFO

Annnnd: 1. The Garden Witch Overalls (Size up!): https://amzn.to/383oGlt


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs and...

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
